name: Miwaku no mori ~ the enchanted forest ~ | VGLgamejam
name_original: Miwaku no mori ~ the enchanted forest ~ | VGLgamejam
description:
... 8 directions arcade shooter made in 48h ...

Play as a fairy crossing the enchanted forest to purge it of the evil that has invaded it. 

  To progress easily, don't forget to LOCK your direction by holding the 'lock' button. CONTROLS:  Keyboard:

Spacebar : Start

Arrows : Move your character

S (hold) / LeftClick : Shoot

D (hold) : Lock your orientation

F (press) : Dash

Gamepad:

Option : Start

D-Pad : Move your character 

Circle / B : Shoot

Cross / A : Lock your orientation

Square / X : Dash

-

Game by :

@AruOtta : Code, LD, GD

@Axelica_ : Graph, Sfx, GD

Made with UNITY
